mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_MENU_ROLE ( id, menu_code, role_name, role_power, memo, is_used ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{menuCode}, #{roleName}, #{rolePower}, #{memo}, #{isUsed} )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_MENU_ROLE SET menu_code = #{menuCode}, role_power = #{rolePower}, role_name = #{roleName}, memo = #{memo}, is_used = #{isUsed} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT m.*, mr.id mr_id, mr.menu_code mr_menu_code, mr.role_name mr_role_name, mr.role_power mr_role_power, mr.memo mr_memo, mr.is_used mr_is_used FROM `t_menu` m left join ( select * from t_menu_role WHERE 1 = 1
GROUP by id ) mr on mr.menu_code = m.menu_code where m.is_used ='1'
